title: Marianne Williamson officially launches 2024 presidential campaign
description: Marianne Williamson said the status quo "will not disrupt itself" as she launched her 2024 presidential campaign.

title: Station master in Greece train crash delays court appearance
description: The station master involved in Greece’s deadliest train crash postponed his deposition and is now set to appear before a prosecutor and an examining magistrate on Sunday

title: Judge dismisses all suits against Oxford school district related to 2021 shooting
description: A Michigan judge has dismissed all civil lawsuits filed against Oxford Community School district and its employees in connection with a 2021 school shooting.

title: Bad smells may be the cause of reported symptoms in East Palestine: Experts
description: Bad smells from the toxic train derailment in East Palestine, Ohio, may be causing health issues.

title: Trump supporters spared more jail time in weapons case
description: They drove a Hummer with guns, ammunition to a Philadelphia vote-counting site.

title: Scout Motors picks South Carolina for new $2B EV plant
description: A Volkswagen Group-backed automotive company announced plans this week.

title: European nations condemn West Bank violence, urge calm
description: The violence could derail efforts to rekindle Israeli-Palestinian peace talks.

title: Athlete dead in shipwreck left Pakistan to help disabled son
description: The sister and a friend of a Pakistani national soccer team player who died in a migrant boat crash off Italy's coast say she took the voyage to find help for disabled son

title: Man arrested for transformer bombings had explosive materials in home: Police
description: A man accused of blowing up two Pacific Gas and Electric transformers had large amounts of explosive materials and an inactive meth lab in his home, authorities said.

title: Mistrial declared in Tucson for man charged in girl's death
description: Jury was unable to reach a verdict on a man accused of killing a 6-year-old girl

title: Ukraine: Mourners commemorate 8 killed in Bucha
description: Eight men were executed by Russian forces during the occupation of Bucha.

title: Police: Officer who shot Black man retired 'in bad standing'
description: An Ohio police officer shot and killed a Black man as he lay in bed in his home.

title: Climate activists target art work near German parliament
description: They drew condemnation from the speaker of parliament and other lawmakers.

title: Lawyers fight for man they say US wrongly deported to Haiti
description: He was deported two years ago to a country where he wasn’t born, never lived.

title: Alaska's arduous Iditarod kicks off with ceremonial start
description: The Iditarod, the world's most famous sled dog race, starts Saturday with a fan-friendly ceremonial run through the streets of Anchorage, Alaska's largest city

title: Pot vote has Oklahoma hungry to rake in green from Texas
description: Oklahoma voters are deciding whether to legalize marijuana sales for those 21 and older

title: WATCH:  Desert covered in snow at Saguaro National Park
description: Stunning footage shows a snowy Saguaro National Park in Arizona as storms sweep across the west. The National Weather Service received reports as high as 4.8 inches of snow in the Tucson area.

title: Indonesia fuel depot fire kills 16, over dozen missing
description: Indonesian rescuers and firefighters are searching for more than a dozen missing under the rubble of charred houses and buildings after a large fire spread from a fuel depot and killed at least 16 people

title: Thai cave boy's ashes arrive home from UK for final farewell
description: The cremated ashes of one of the 12 boys rescued from a flooded cave in 2018 have arrived in the far northern Thai province of Chiang Rai where final Buddhist rites for his funeral will be held over the next few days following his death in the U.K. Dua...

title: Olympic ticket sales for Paris Games gets off to rocky start
description: Organizers of next year’s Paris Olympics promised relatively modest prices and “egalitarian” access to events through an online system meant to revolutionize ticket sales and bring the masses to stadiums and arenas for as little as $26

title: Utah governor says he plans to sign abortion clinic ban
description: Utah Gov. Spencer Cox said on Friday that he plans to sign a measure that would effectively ban abortion clinics from operating in the state

title: 3 children dead, 2 injured in stabbing at a Texas home
description: Five children were stabbed in an attack at a Texas home and three died, police said.

title: NASCAR star Elliott has leg surgery after snowboard accident
description: NASCAR superstar Chase Elliott has had surgery on his left leg after being injured in a snowboarding accident earlier Friday in Colorado

title: Actor Tom Sizemore dies at 61
description: Tom Sizemore, an actor best known for his roles in "Saving Private Ryan," "Black Hawk Down" and more, has died at age 61.

title: 3 Indiana men guilty in fatal shooting of 3 men, 1 woman
description: A prosecutor says three Indianapolis men have been convicted of murder and other charges in the fatal shooting of three young men and a young woman found slain in a ransacked apartment

title: Abortion clinic ban heads to Utah governor for signature
description: The fate of abortion clinics in Utah now lies with Gov. Spencer Cox after lawmakers finalized and passed a measure to ban them in the state

title: Utah man who killed family was investigated by child agency
description: New documents reveal that child protective services had opened an investigation of a Utah man just weeks before he killed seven of his family members and then himself

title: 'Help Us!!': Stranded residents plead for help after snowstorm
description: Authorities are working to get much-needed supplies to Southern California mountain communities days after a series of rare winter snowstorms struck the region.
